snippet: Ron Balasco joined Redbook, New York, part of the Hearst Magazines unit of the Hearst Corporation, as health account director, responsible for sales in the health care categories.
lead_paragraph: Ron Balasco joined Redbook, New York, part of the Hearst Magazines unit of the Hearst Corporation, as health account director, responsible for sales in the health care categories.
